Incarnate {6}{U}{U} [i](If you cast this for its incarnate cost, as it resolves, merge it over target creature you own as an Avatar. It keeps all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Take an extra turn after this one.
This Revelation can't be blocked.
If Time's Waves Ripple would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
